About.body2: Joined an SES company and started a career as an engineer

1.title: Job Management System Development
1.body: Acted as the lead engineer, responsible from foundational design. Engaged in overall tasks including technical selection, code review, specification adjustments, and client communication.
1.detail:
A project to replace an existing job management system with a new one. Took charge as the lead engineer from foundational design. Engaged in all aspects, including technical selection, code review, specification adjustments, and client communication. Since fast search processing was essential, many considerations were made regarding the database architecture.
Introduced a code review process to ensure code maintainability and safety, as there was no prior culture for it. While bugs still occurred, they were minimized. I focused on writing code that was easy for the team to work with and ensured code consistency.

2.title: HR System Development
2.body: Developed a system to digitize paper-based HR processes for a major advertising agency. Responsible for requirements gathering, functional design, and implementation.
2.detail: Digitized the paper-based HR processes for a major advertising agency. Previously, a combination of external services and Excel was used, which was replaced with a centralized system that integrated with other services and managed the workflow. Responsible for requirements gathering, functional design, and implementation. Existing employee data was used for authentication, requiring careful management of user access permissions.

3.title: Migration of 6 Million Records
3.body: Performed a large-scale data migration involving 6 million customer records. Acted as the team leader while handling tasks alongside development work.
3.detail:
Migrated 6 million customer records for the relaxation industry, including both system updates and data migration. The migration involved sensitive data such as personal information, card details, and historical records. Optimized the migration process, reducing the time from 8 hours to 1 hour by refactoring the existing process, tuning queries, and optimizing memory management.
Maintained data integrity while addressing inaccurate data and unexpected inputs. Served as the team leader, managing tasks alongside development work.

4.title: Mobile App Development
4.body: Developed a kimono management app using Flutter. Implemented state management with Riverpod and was responsible for notification features and UI design.
4.detail:
Developed a kimono management app using Flutter, allowing customers to view information about their stored kimonos. Handled the notification feature and basic UI design. The backend API was built with Java.
State management was implemented using Riverpod. Data was stored both locally (using shared_preferences) and on the server. Firebase was used to implement push notifications. The architecture was based on clean architecture principles, with careful library selection for each requirement.

5.title: Local Government DX Project
5.body: Digitalized paper-based administrative processes for a local government, focusing on birth and marriage registration systems.
5.detail: Digitalized paper-based administrative processes for a local government in the Kanto region, including birth and marriage registrations. Handled requirements gathering, database design, and core implementation. Since the team had many junior members, I took on a sub-leader role while contributing to development.

6.title: Media Industry System Replacement
6.body: Replaced a media management system for a major advertising agency, migrating from Ruby to PHP.
6.detail:
Replaced a media management system for a major advertising agency, migrating from Ruby (Ruby on Rails) to PHP. The system needed to retain its original functionality and appearance, requiring significant effort compared to typical development. With no design documents available, the system was recreated directly from the existing source code.
Eventually took on the role of team leader, managing tasks and progress while contributing to implementation.

7.title: Real Estate System Development
7.body: Developed an after-sales service system for real estate customers.
7.detail: Developed an after-sales service system for real estate customers. Conducted requirement definitions and collaborated with the team leader. Handled both front-end and back-end tasks, including login functionality and basic CRUD operations.

About.title: About
About.body1: My name is Horiuchi, a freelance engineer. After studying at Soka University and briefly pursuing a career as a doctor, I became captivated by the world of IT in 2016 and started my career in this field.
About.body2: Since 2017, I have been involved in web system development using PHP as my primary language, improving my technical skills across various projects.
About.body3: In 2019, I became independent and decided to gain a broader range of experiences as a freelance engineer. My primary tech stack includes PHP, Laravel, React, Next.js, and Flutter.
About.body4: I provide flexible and efficient solutions to meet client needs, solving real-world problems through technology and contributing to project success.
